title: NapytauPersistedData
description: Research data conforming to the Napytau schema

relativeVelocity.description: The relative velocity of the particles measured in the experiment

relativeVelocityError.description: The error in the relative velocity of the particles measured in the experiment

dataPoints.description: The data points measured in the experiment

distance.description: The distance between the particles at the time of the data point

distanceError.description: The error in the distance between the particles at the time of the data point

calibration.description: The calibration factor for the data point

calibrationError.description: The error in the calibration factor for the data point

shiftedIntensity.description: The measured shifted intensity of the data point

shiftedIntensityError.description: The error in the measured shifted intensity of the data point

unshiftedIntensity.description: The measured unshifted intensity of the data point

unshiftedIntensityError.description: The error in the measured unshifted intensity of the data point

feedingShiftedIntensity.description: The measured feeding shifted intensity of the data point

feedingShiftedIntensityError.description: The error in the measured feeding shifted intensity of the data point

feedingUnshiftedIntensity.description: The measured feeding unshifted intensity of the data point

feedingUnshiftedIntensityError.description: The error in the measured feeding unshifted intensity of the data point

setups.description: A list of setups previously configured in Napytau

tauFactor.description: The tau factor of the setup

tauFactorError.description: The error in the tau factor of the setup

polynomialCount.description: The polynomial count of the setup

datapointSetups.description: Setup data for each datapoint of the experiment

tau.description: The calculated tau of the data point

tauError.description: The error in the calculated tau of the data point

active.description: Whether the data point is active or not
